nodes.text: The Executor II-class Star Dreadnought was a type of Executor-class Star Dreadnought used by the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. At one point, one such Star Dreadnought flew over a cloudy celestial body with two Imperial-class Star Destroyers. The model was propelled by red-hued engines and it succeeded the Executor I-class Star Dreadnought.

The Executor II-class Star Dreadnought was first mentioned on a card of the same name in the 2019 Super Star Destroyer Expansion Pack by Fantasy Flight Games, for the miniatures game Star Wars: Armada. The image of the ship was illustrated by Matt Bradbury.
